entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 11 March 2023
